```{r Load data set}
df <- read.csv(file = "resultsMei.csv", header=TRUE)
```

## Analysis ---------------

```{r Summary of data}
summary(df)
```

# ANOVA 3 ---------------

# Factors ---------------

```{r Factors}
n_vert <- factor(df$n,levels = c(2000,3000,5000,9000))

prob <- factor(df$p,levels = c(0.3,0.5,0.7))

code <- factor(df$Dinic,levels = c(1))

head(df)

str(df)

table(df$code, df$prob, df$n_vert)

ggboxplot(df, x = "n_vert", y = "time", color = "prob",
          palette = c("#00AFBB", "#E7B800"))
```


```{r ANOVA 3 }
res.aov1 <- aov(df$Dinic~df$prob*df$n_vert, data = df)
summary(res.aov1)

res.aov3 <- aov(df$code~df$prob*df$n_vert, data = df)
summary(res.aov2)

res.aov3 <- aov(df$code~df$prob*df$n_vert, data = df)
summary(res.aov3)
```


```{r Grupping data}
group_by(df,code, prob, n_vert) %>%
  summarise(
    count = n(),
    mean = mean(time, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd = sd(time, na.rm = TRUE)
  )

model.tables(res.aov3, type="means", se = TRUE)

```

# Normalidade plots ---------------

```{r Normalidade dos plots}

plot(res.aov1, 1)

plot(res.aov2, 1)

plot(res.aov3)

res<-res.aov3$residuals

hist(res,main="Histogram of residuals",xlab="Residuals")

```

# Post HOC Analysis ---------------

```{r Post HOC}
TukeyHSD(res.aov1)
plot(TukeyHSD(res.aov1, conf.level=.95), las = 2)
```
